# m3ter Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "m3ter" {
  api_key = "My API Key"
  api_secret = "My API Secret"
  token = "My Token"
  org_id = "My Org ID"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String)
- `api_secret` (String)
- `base_url` (String) Set the base url that the provider connects to.
- `org_id` (String)
- `token` (String)
